Posts.EditableText:
Hey everyone,

I just thought I'd let you all know (since no one other than quest users will give a crap) that I finished the bulk of my game.  I now have completed the entire main story, with the all the puzzles, differant solutions, and multiple endings.  It plays through great and bug free (and it only took 10 months of hard work to make.)

All I have to do now is put in all the filler (look at the carpet, eat the paint off the wall, etc) that makes these games fun and I will be ready for testing and release.  Hopefully in a couple more months I'll be finally finished (though I have yet to name the darn thing).

My goal is to have it done in one year, so I am going to keep at it.  I hope all of your projects are coming along just as well.

Happy Holidays,
Dr. Froth

Posts.EditableText: My program is unrelated to the project you heard of. Check out http://mirror.ifarchive.org/ It'll be in unprocessed/ or programming/quest/ Current version is 0.4, but I'm doing a heavy rewrite at present.
